testcase.name: Prouser Submit a Claim as passenger in a car
testcase.system-out: Given prouser logins into whiplash application..............................passed When prouser enter all mandatory details for claim creation as 'A passenger on a bus' and 'NO' and 'NO'.passed Then claim is created for prouser...........................................passed

testcase.name: Compensator receives claim and claim liability sent to TPA
testcase.system-out: Given Claim is sent to the compensator.....................................passed When compensator receives claim and send to TPA.............................passed Then claims acceptance and liability decision is now sent to TPA............passed

testcase.name: TPA disputes causation and admits full liability
testcase.system-out: Given Login as TPA..........................................................passed When TPA accepts full liability.............................................passed Then claims acceptance and liability information is passed to claimant......passed

testcase.name: Claimant Request first Interim Payment
testcase.system-out: Given claim has been accepted for 'prouser'.................................passed When 'prouser' requests interim payment.....................................passed Then interim payment request is sent to compensator.........................passed

testcase.name: Compensator makes first interim payment
testcase.system-out: Given Login as TPA..........................................................passed When compensator makes interim payment......................................passed Then claimant receives interim payment......................................passed

testcase.name: Claimant reviews and accepts first interim payment
testcase.system-out: Given claim has been accepted for 'prouser'.................................passed When 'prouser' reviews and accept interim decision..........................passed Then payment is not received by the claimant................................passed

testcase.name: Claimant decides to go to court for interim over non-payment
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' interim non-payment SLA is breached.........................passed When Go to court for non-payment option is enabled for 'prouser'............passed Then claimant decides to go to court over interim non-payment...............passed

testcase.name: Claimant select court docs for interim non-payment
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' goes to court over interim..................................passed When 'prouser' selects document for court for interim non-payment...........passed Then court document are sent to compensator.................................passed

testcase.name: Compensator reviews court document for Interim non-payment
testcase.system-out: Given Login as TPA..........................................................passed When Compensator reviews court document for interim.........................passed Then court docs sent for review to claimant.................................passed

testcase.name: prouser Claimant acknowledges TPA doc selection and case is resolved
testcase.system-out: Given prouser receives claim for acknowledgement............................passed When prouser claimant acknowledge for Interim...............................passed Then case is closed at court stage..........................................passed

testcase.name: Prouser uploads medical report
testcase.system-out: Given upload medical report is enabled for 'prouser'........................passed When "prouser" uploads medical report with Uplift request...................passed Then medical report is uploaded and offer request is sent to compensator....passed

testcase.name: TPA First Offer to Prouser
testcase.system-out: Given Login as TPA..........................................................passed When the TPA makes first offer with NON whiplash injury with uplift.........passed Then offer is sent to claimant..............................................passed

testcase.name: Prouser rejects offer and goes to court
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' receives new offer..........................................passed When "prouser" decided to go to court after rejecting first offer...........passed Then counter offer is sent for revision.....................................passed

testcase.name: Prouser selected Court proceeding started and selected documents for court
testcase.system-out: Given "prouser" started court proceeding....................................passed When "prouser" selected Court proceeding started as Yes.....................passed And "prouser" selected documents for court..................................passed Then documents sent to TPA..................................................passed

testcase.name: TPA acknowledges documents selected for court
testcase.system-out: Given claimant selects court documents TPA..................................passed When TPA agrees to court documents when claim is in 'Pending-OfferListReview'.passed Then claim is sent to claimant..............................................passed

testcase.name: Claimant checks the documents selected by TPA and proceeds the claim for court
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' checks the documents uploaded by Compensator................passed When "prouser" entered details in court screen..............................passed Then Case is closed with Go to court at offer stage.........................passed
